articles.title: About this blog
articles.description:
Welcome to my Blog.

This blog site is served a repository to publish my data analytics works derived from my SMU courses or my pet projects!

I would like to share some interesting insights or skills that surfaced from my experiences. 

If you have any questions, feel free to reach me at hngling@gmail.com.

articles.title: Data Analytics by the tool Tableau!
articles.description:
This page is to show the some Data Visualizations done by Tableau. 

Hope you enjoy reading it! Feel free to contact me if you have any comments or feedback!
articles.contents: Welcome to Data Viz by Tableau!

articles.title: Welcome to my Blog
articles.description:
Initially, this blog site was created to fulfill the requirements from SMU program Master of IT in Business - Data Analytics track.
Later on, I expanded it to document my data analytics works from my spare time.
I hope you enjoy reading it!
